IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: METRO WEST COUNCIL OF GOVERNMENT PROMOTES INTERGOVERNMENTAL COOPERATION AND COMMUNICATION BETWEEN THE MEMBER MUNICIPALITIES; TO ARTICULATE POSITIONS AND WHEN APPROPRIATE, IMPLEMENT SOLUTIONS TO REGIONAL, COUNTYWIDE AND STATE ISSUE. THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES RESEARCH AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE IN THE DEVELOPMENT OF SOLUTIONS TO LOCAL ISSUES PRESENTED BY MEMBER MUNICIPALITIES. THE COUNCIL PROVIDES TRAINING AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS DESIGNED TO FOSTER LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT AND AN UNDERSTANDING OF MUNICIPAL ISSUES. THE COUNCIL COORDINATES GROWTH AND TRANSPORTATION ISSUES AFFECTING THE REGIONS THEY SERVE. THE COUNCIL ALSO UPHOLDS AND ADVOCATES PRINCIPLES OF EFFECTIVE LOCAL GOVERNMENT. FINALLY, THE COUNCIL PERFORMS AN AND ALL SUCH OTHER ACTS CONSIDERED NECESSARY OR DESIRABLE TO CARRY OUT THE ABOVE OBJECTIVES.

IRS990.Desc: SPRINGFIELD DOWN DRIVE - A YEARLY EVENT TO EXPOSE THE MEMBERS TO THE GENERAL ASSEMBLY AND MEET WITH ELECTED OFFICIALS REGARDING LEGISLATIVE PRIORITIES AS WELL AS MEET WITH AGENCY HEADS TO FORM RELATIONSHIPS AND DISCUSS TOPICS OF MUTUAL INTEREST.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: LEGISLATIVE BREAKFAST - AN OPPORTUNITY FOR LEGISLATORS TO SIT IN A PANEL FORMAT AND UPDATE ON LEGISLATION, AND FOR MEMBERS TO ASK QUESTIONS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: LEGISLATIVE BARBEQUE - PRESENTATION GIVEN AS LEGISLATIVE SESSION WRAP UP AND DISCUSS FUTURE PRIORITIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: STATE OF THE COUNTIES - OPPORTUNITY FOR THE MEMBERS TO HEAR UPDATES FROM THE COUNTY CHAIRMAN OF KANE, KENDALL AND DEKALB COUNTIES, AND TO DISCUSS POSSIBLE JOINT ISSUES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: METRO WEST COUNCIL OF GOVERNMENT PROMOTES INTERGOVERNMENTAL COOPERATION AND COMMUNICATION BETWEEN THE MEMBER MUNICIPALITIES; TO ARTICULATE POSITIONS AND WHEN APPROPRIATE, IMPLEMENT SOLUTIONS TO REGIONAL, COUNTYWIDE AND STATE ISSUE. THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES RESEARCH AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE IN THE DEVELOPMENT OF SOLUTIONS TO LOCAL ISSUES PRESENTED BY MEMBER MUNICIPALITIES. THE COUNCIL PROVIDES TRAINING AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS DESIGNED TO FOSTER LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT AND AN UNDERSTANDING OF MUNICIPAL ISSUES. THE COUNCIL COORDINATES GROWTH AND TRANSPORTATION ISSUES AFFECTING THE REGIONS THEY SERVE. THE COUNCIL ALSO UPHOLDS AND ADVOCATES PRINCIPLES OF EFFECTIVE LOCAL GOVERNMENT. FINALLY, THE COUNCIL PERFORMS AN AND ALL SUCH OTHER ACTS CONSIDERED NECESSARY OR DESIRABLE TO CARRY OUT THE ABOVE OBJECTIVES.
STATE OF THE COUNTIES - OPPORTUNITY FOR THE MEMBERS TO HEAR UPDATES FROM THE COUNTY CHAIRMAN OF KANE, KENDALL AND DEKALB COUNTIES, AND TO DISCUSS POSSIBLE JOINT ISSUES.

ALL MUNICIPALITIES WITHIN KANE, KENDALL, AND DEKALB COUNTIES ARE ELIGIBLE TO BECOME MEMBERS OF METRO WEST. EACH MEMBER IS REPRESENTED ON THE BOARD BY ITS MAYOR OR PRESIDENT, AND ITS ADMINISTRATOR OR MANAGER, IF THEY HAVE ONE. THE MUNICIPALITIES PAY ANNUAL MEMBERSHIP DUES TO BECOME MEMBERS OF METRO WEST COUNCIL OF GOVERNMENT.

THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE HAS AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE FULL BOARD IF A SITUATION ARISES IN BETWEEN MEETINGS, WHICH MUST BE DEALT WITH BEFORE THE NEXT MEETING. THE BOARD VOTES ON AND ELECTS THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE BOARD CONSISTS OF THE MAYOR/PRESIDENT AND MANAGER/ADMINISTRATOR OF EACH MEMBER MUNICIPALITY.

THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS SHALL HAVE SUPERVISION, CONTROL AND DIRECTION OF THE AFFAIRS ON THE COUNCIL, SHALL DETERMINE ITS POLICIES OR CHANGES WITHIN THE LIMITS OF THE BYLAWS, SHALL ACTIVELY PROSECUTE ITS PURPOSES, AND SHALL HAVE DIRECTION IN THE DISBURSEMENT OF ITS FUNDS.
BEFORE SUBMISSION TO THE IRS, THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

ANNUALLY, CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS ARE DISTRIBUTED TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS. AFTER COLLECTING THE COMPLETED FORMS, WE NOTE WHICH INDICATE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEWS THEM. WE MAINTAIN A FILE ON THESE AND REVIEW THEM IF WE ARE TAKING ANY ACTION THAT COULD TRIGGER A CONFLICT OF INTEREST. IF THAT OCCURS, THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WILL NOTIFY THE AFFECTED BOARD MEMBER AND THE BOARD PRESIDENT AND THE AFFECTED BOARD MEMBER WILL THEN BE EXCLUDED FROM ANY VOTES ON THAT ISSUE.
NO OFFICER OR TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIAL, EXCEPT FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR SHALL RECEIVE ANY COMPENSATION FOR THEIR SERVICE.
THE ORGANIZATION OBTAINS A DOCUMENTED COMPARISON OF SALARIES AND BENEFITS OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS OF COUNCILS OF GOVERNMENT IN OUR REGIOIN. RAISES MUST BE APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.
THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
